positive.review: Great game, some bugs but nothing that doesnt get sorted by devs, buy it each year

Faster load, more realistic game play and graphics than ever.
Whats not to like;)

I am soon at 400 Hours playing this game, so yeah it is pretty good. I recommend playing on the highest difficulty in the career mode for a better experience. The game is not very good at giving you the informations you need so you will have to figure it out yourself but you will be fine. 85 is your best friend if you don't want to spend the red bar.
A lot of small changes would do wonders for this. But its still a good upgrade compared to earlier entries
This is an amazing rendition of the game in the series, I really enjoyed it this year :)
Indoor cycling - thumbs up
good
Good Game!
Great game, some bugs but nothing that doesnt get sorted by devs, buy it each year

The game is not very good at giving you the informations you need so you will have to figure it out yourself but you will be fine. 85 is your best friend if you don't want to spend the red bar.

CARS AND MOTORCYCLES TOO CLOSE TO PRO CYCLIST

different year same s**t playing as pro cyclist and yet again the car and motorcycles need to be the centre of attention get to the front of the peleton and brake away and the car and motorcycles are all over my cyclists rear wheel going downhill the bikes and car are always over taking my cyclist even when i am 100km from the finish line
when you speed up the game it is even worse speed up the game to X8 and the bikes and cars are all over the cyclist from start to finish of a stge race
please sort this out as it spoils the enjoyment of the game
the car and bikes have come close to knocking my cyclist off the bike on atleast 10 occasions
Big Loving this game! Big cycling fan and this game is quite well made. Support these devs to keep making it awesome!
Yes yes great game love love big time next one should be way better :)
This is an amazing rendition of the game in the series, I really enjoyed it this year :)
always nice game, just very similar year after year
It is a very good game for cycling fans!
Indoor cycling - thumbs up
good
really fun
fun time wish there was an editor
Good Game!
pretty fun

negative.review:
Every year they release a game that needs 3+ months of patches to make the game somewhat normal. 
I think it's time they skip a year to make an actual completed game. Since Tour de france game came out this has been shoved to the side. Pro cycling career has been the same for years now. I don't understand that they don't see how much potential this has. It could be so vast with tons of features but they just don't care. 
i've been playing this game since 2006, with every year at least 500h+. I have lost interest within 2 months. 
I rather have an in depth game with shit graphics than decent graphics with a beta game.

I have played cycling manager from the first version up untill 2016 and then after years of of not playing decided to buy it again. I must honestly say that not much has changed. The graphics look the same, the career is the same menu that needs 8 clicks to get where you need it to be. You can still use the same buttons to relay, effort, etc. and these core mechanics haven't changed a bit. The sprints work the same, just line some up and use effort when the one in front is tired and GG EZ WIN. 

For a game that has been around so long it's crazy how much in almost 25 years things haven't changed. If I purely look at the graphics on my 4k game PC which is brand new and runs everything on ultra high, I could honestly not tell you the difference from this version or 2016. And even then it wouldn't make a difference as most stages are still the same bugged out versions where walls are on the track and cyclists run through each other. And omg this game still crashes soooo much if you do a career for a whole year expect 10 stages to be unplayable because it will keep on crashing.

The only reason that PCM still exists is that there isn't an alternative ready yet but this is also the main reason we haven't seen any innovation for over 10 years. If you like cycling and can look through the awful game and boring careermode then you have the best spreadsheet manager for cycling on the market, because it's the only one.

I think it's time they skip a year to make an actual completed game. Since Tour de france game came out this has been shoved to the side. Pro cycling career has been the same for years now. I don't understand that they don't see how much potential this has. It could be so vast with tons of features but they just don't care. 
i've been playing this game since 2006, with every year at least 500h+. I have lost interest within 2 months. 
I rather have an in depth game with shit graphics than decent graphics with a beta game.

This Year Pulling Group Mechanic is Terrible No Matter Which Terrain İs İt.İn My Carrer I Have 4 Best Time Trial Rider İn The World Their Flat And Time Trial Skill Above 80 But When İt Comes To Effort on 85 Percent They Are Still İn The Same Speed With Some Climber How İs that Possibe. İt İs Same İn The Mountain Terrain Some Flat Terrain Rider Climb Better Than My Team. İt Need To be Fix

I own PCM 2020, and there's so little difference between the two... pass if you own any PCM's from the last 5 years. You're not missing out.

Edit: After a few more hours, I find that PCM25 is actually worse...

I own PCM 2020, and there's so little difference between the two... pass if you own any PCM's from the last 5 years. You're not missing out.

Edit: After a few more hours, I find that PCM25 is actually worse...

I have played cycling manager from the first version up untill 2016 and then after years of of not playing decided to buy it again. I must honestly say that not much has changed. The graphics look the same, the career is the same menu that needs 8 clicks to get where you need it to be. You can still use the same buttons to relay, effort, etc. and these core mechanics haven't changed a bit. The sprints work the same, just line some up and use effort when the one in front is tired and GG EZ WIN. 

For a game that has been around so long it's crazy how much in almost 25 years things haven't changed. If I purely look at the graphics on my 4k game PC which is brand new and runs everything on ultra high, I could honestly not tell you the difference from this version or 2016. And even then it wouldn't make a difference as most stages are still the same bugged out versions where walls are on the track and cyclists run through each other. And omg this game still crashes soooo much if you do a career for a whole year expect 10 stages to be unplayable because it will keep on crashing.

The only reason that PCM still exists is that there isn't an alternative ready yet but this is also the main reason we haven't seen any innovation for over 10 years. If you like cycling and can look through the awful game and boring careermode then you have the best spreadsheet manager for cycling on the market, because it's the only one.

Every year they release a game that needs 3+ months of patches to make the game somewhat normal. 
I think it's time they skip a year to make an actual completed game. Since Tour de france game came out this has been shoved to the side. Pro cycling career has been the same for years now. I don't understand that they don't see how much potential this has. It could be so vast with tons of features but they just don't care. 
i've been playing this game since 2006, with every year at least 500h+. I have lost interest within 2 months. 
I rather have an in depth game with shit graphics than decent graphics with a beta game.
